meanings.sent1: She was ripping the paper with all her might.
meanings.sent2: The dog was ripping apart the toy in seconds.

meanings.sent4: The storm was ripping through the trees, leaving a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ripping fabric echoed through the room.
